data.text: I usually love to go underground , they have happy hour 4pm to 8pm . Staff were very friendly especially Gen and Michel they were very friendly and polite . Food was always same taste from chef Dennis and Sajit . My favorite food was Jerk Chicken if your spicy liver you should try it . Thank you all.
data.title: Underground pub the best

data.text: Amazing ramadan atmosphere, food is so delicious and service is super, thanks to Wajahat for the amazing experience, he was very prompt with a big smile on his face. Beautiful place for iftar and fabulous experience overall. Even the Oud music and decorations and every single detail!
data.title: Lovely ramadan iftar experience!!

data.text:
Terrible experience from the get-go! The lady wearing glasses at the reception, while checking didn’t even pay attention to our requests, but gave a thorough treatment to the lady standing behind us in the line. We arrived at noon with two little kids (2 and 1 year old) requested a crib for our, but since nobody really cares, we’ve got it only around 11pm at night after numerous phone calls and visits to the reception.

Also stay away from the steak/bar place near the reception, although we had all-inclusive package the hostess stopped us from entering and said she’d first double check “if we really have all inclusive for our kids” before we are allowed to be served, what nonsense and disrespect. But that wasn’t the worst part about this bar, the same night when we were in our room, around 11pm we started receiving phone calls from this place, same lady was calling and demanding that we come down and pay(were still not sure what we were supposed to pay for), we kindly asked her to meet in the morning as our kids were being put asleep. Few minutes she started calling again,and woke up the children. It a was super UNPLEASANT experience.

Stay away and remember all-inclusive is not really including everything!!!
data.title: Completely spoiled a long awaited vacation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Maps01547176068,

Greetings from Habtoor Grand Resort Autograph Collection!

Thank you for the opportunity to provide your helpful feedback concerning your recent stay with us. We are truly sorry to learn that the arrival experience was not up to your expectations.

All-Inclusive package information and inclusion is shared by the Tour operator to the guests and upon check in- the team is explaining the package inclusions along with a flyer, we are very sorry if this was not clearly informed to you during the check in process and we do apologies for the unpleasant experience with the situation of the Hostess in the Grand Grill Restaurant, the incident has been shared with the concerned department for appropriate corrective action.

Feedback such as yours allows us to improve on our services to make it better in the future.

I hope you would consider giving us another chance in the future to demonstrate the true quality of our hospitality.

Best Regards,

Khalid Saeed
General Manager
owner_response.author: Kayce Janeo

data.text: Matti is the best waiter I’ve had ever. Helped us everyday with everything and was always looking out for us. The other waiters and waitresses were also good and kind. The beach and all inclusive bars were the highlights and the Lucianos restaurant was the stand out. Could do with more restaurants though as minimal choice.
data.title: 10 day stay

data.text:
Wonderful staff - Hassam, Matti, Bharakat, Ahmed, Shania and Sylvia looked after us on the 25th floor for breakfast and drinks on an evening. Charming people indeed looked after us so well. 

Hotel great for travelling with 3 teenagers The Underground Pub showing live football.  Restaurants great food and staff again lovely. 

Beach area was nice and watersports next door. 

Only downside was cranes and building work going on which did spoil our view and could be noisy. Obviously this won’t be forever, so would recommend to people with teenagers music was up to date and constant at the pool which we liked but appreciate not for everyone.   

Sa
data.title: Great for teenagers and people with families
